text: Ek professional aur attractive theme choose karen jo aapki product category ke saath match karta ho. Shopify pe bohat saare free aur paid themes mojood hain.
Apne brand ki personality ko reflect karne wale colors ka istamal karen. Ek consistent color scheme use karen pure store mein.
High-quality aur engaging banner images use karen jo aapki products ko highlight karen aur customers ko attract karen.  Slideshow bhi use kar sakte hain.
Apni products ko strategically place karen taake woh easily visible hon.  Best-selling products ko highlight karen.
Check karen ke aapki store mobile devices pe bhi properly dikh raha hai.  Mobile users bohat zyada hain aajkal.
